FeaturesSection.title: A Suite of Tools, Unlimited Potential
FeaturesSection.subtitle: Everything you need to scale your affiliate operations, powered by the most advanced technology.

builder.title: AI Landing Builder
builder.description: Create high-converting sales and capture pages in minutes with our AI-guided builder.

copywriter.title: AI Copywriter Pro
copywriter.description: Generate persuasive copy for your ads, emails, and landing pages that connects with your audience and sells.

analytics.title: Predictive Analysis
analytics.description: Our AI analyzes your metrics and gives you clear insights to optimize your campaigns and maximize your ROI.

assistant.title: L.I.A. Assistant
assistant.description: Your personal marketing strategist. Answer questions, generate ideas, and audit your strategies 24/7.

HeroSection.title: Build High-Performance Affiliate Campaigns with AI
